1good.bet Review

6.2

Bonuses

6/10

Regular Players Treatment

8/10

Support

10/10

Rating from Trustpilot 2.9/5

Play Now

Overview

1good.bet is a very new online casino and betting site with over 4,000 games from around 50 different game providers. They offer fairly good welcome promotions, but take care as some bonuses terms might be a bit tricky to understand!

The casino is very easy to use although the look is a bit plain. Depositing in crypto can be a bit confusing, because they offer 3 different options which appear the same at first glance, but offer different currencies and payment limits. They also offer little anonymity, however the use of their bonuses is very simple through the use of your account.

Established in 2021, 1good.bet casino is regulated and licensed by the Government of Curacao.

1good.bet Traffic

Players Top GEOs:

1good.bet casino is either very new or has too few organic searches, so there is not yet enough data to show.

1good.bet Bonuses

5/10

Number of Welcome + Regular Bonuses

1good.bet could have more welcome and regular bonuses (the best casinos offer at least 7).

Welcome Bonus Amount

1good.bet could have a higher welcome package amount (the best casinos offer at least 1 BTC).

Welcome Bonus Free Spins

1good.bet offers at least 200 free spins in their welcome bonuses!

Number of Regular Weekly Promotions

1good.bet offers very few regular promotions (most casinos have at least 2 weekly promotions).

* Regular Promotions = all time unlimited promotions without the welcome offer and bonuses in the VIP/loyalty program

Regular Weekly Promotions Amount

1good.bet doesn't offer any regular weekly promotions in form of match bonuses or cash prizes.

Regular Weekly Free Spins

1good.bet offers very few weekly free spins (most casinos offer at least 100).

Wagering Requirements

1good.bet has very high wagering requirements (most casinos require 40x wagering (on bonus) or less).

* Average wagering requirements across all regular bonuses are taken into account.

1Good.Bet casino offers quite a good welcome offer and you can even choose between two different no deposit bonuses! However, if you're a player who enjoys bonuses regularly, even after the welcome promotions run out, then 1Good.Bet shouldn't be your choice.

When it comes to no deposit bonuses, these are your options:

  • 250 free spins with 40x wagering and bonus code: GOOD250
  • Exclusive 100 free spins on Wolf Gold from Pragmatic Play, 30x wagering and bonus code: NDB100FS

The 250 free spins option is one of the biggest (if not the biggest) no deposit bonus I have seen in crypto casinos. 40x wagering is pretty regular, although you can find no deposit bonuses with much lower wagering as well (at FortuneJack, for example). The winnings here are limited to 100 €.

1Good.Bet offered everybody who signs up through Gamblineers the exclusive 100 free spins bonus (although you can use the 250 one as well if you wish). It might seem strange to offer an exclusive bonus which is lower than the regular one, but what's special about is that it can be used on Wolf Gold slot. If you're not familiar with it, that is one of the most popular slots of all times. Also, the wagering is lower at 30x. There is a catch, however. In order to wager the bonus, you must make a deposit of at least $10, because real money is the only way this bonus can be wagered. This is a condition that I haven't seen anywhere else and is in my honest opinion a bit unfair compared to what you can get in other casinos.

So in this case I actually recommend you to take the default no deposit bonus, UNLESS you want to play the free spins on Wolf Gold. That is basically the only reason I can think of that can make our exclusive bonus worth it.

After the no deposit bonuses, the welcome package continues as follows:
You once again have two choices for your first deposit:

  • 100% up to 1000 € + 100 free spins, 40x wagering on bonus and 10 € min. deposit
  • 125% up to $2000 + 100 free spins, 30x wagering on bonus+deposit and $20 min. deposit, bonus code: VIKINGSCAD125

In this case I recommend the first one. The wagering is lower, which gives you much better chances at winning. Pick the second one only if you're after more than 1000 € of bonus.

The rest of the welcome package:

  • Second deposit bonus: 125% up to 1250 € + 125 free spins, 45x wagering on bonus, 20 € min. deposit
  • Third deposit bonus: 150% up to 1500 € + 150 free spins, 45x wagering on bonus, 30 € min. deposit
  • Fourth deposit bonus: 175% up to 1750 € + 175 free spins, 50x wagering on bonus, 50 € min. deposit
  • Fifth deposit bonus: 200% up to 2000 € + 200 free spins, 55x wagering on bonus, 75 € min. deposit

This makes 1Good.Bet's welcome package one of the biggest in number of bonuses, although not the biggest in value. mBit casino and BitStarz for comparisson, both give at least 1 BTC per bonus. However, to get an increasing percentage as you climb through the welcome bonuses, is pretty rare. Usually, bonuses after the first deposit have a much lower match percentage (think 50 or 75%). This means that you will get much more money in 1Good.Bet as you would in other casinos, although only up to the max. value of their bonuses. The wagering is relatively high, making your odds of winning slimmer. When it comes to free spins, 1Good.Bet once again makes quite a good example, as 1000 welcome free spins (if you use the default no deposit bonus) is rare to come by!

If you were hoping to hear more about reload bonuses, regular free spins or cashbacks, then I have to disappoint you. So far, this is all that 1Good.Bet offers. They might offer something more in their newsletters, but you will have to find that out for yourself. If regular bonuses are a requirement for you, then check mBit casino and BitStarz instead.

1good.bet Bonus Code

Both no deposit bonuses for 1Good.Bet use a bonus code to activate them:

  • 250 free spins: GOOD250
  • Exclusive 100 free spins: NDB100FS

Again, I recommend the 250 free spins bonus, except if you want to play Wolf Gold by Pragmatic Play, then the exclusive 100 free spins is the way to go.

For the first deposit bonuses, only one has a bonus code and that is 125% up to $2000: VIKINGSCAD125
However, I recommend their regular first deposit bonus up to $1000 for which you don't need a code. I has better wagering requirements.

Be careful when you're using bonus codes. You need to enter them in a separate part of your account and not while making a deposit. Make sure you read their terms first, so you don't mess up the process and accidentally lose your bonuses.

1good.bet Games

9/10

Number of Games

1good.bet has more games than most casinos!

Game Providers

1good.bet has games from more game providers than most casinos!

Game Variety

1good.bet has all the popular regular and live games (slots, poker, roulette, blackjack, baccarat)!

Provably Fair Games

1good.bet offers games provably fair by the player

Number of Crypto Games

1good.bet has one of the most diverse offers of crypto games!

* Crypto games: Dice, Plinko, Crash, Wheel Spin, Hi-Lo

1Good.Bet offers around 4,000 games from nearly 50 different game providers.

Their lobby uses the classic categories of games and they include some more refined categories for slots to shorten the navigation time in order to find your preference. Among all classic casino games, they also offer virtual sports and have chosen to feature games from Evolution in a separate "submenu" category for some reason.

Their game collection is complete. They don't have their own games, but they have every game category covered, including dice and crash (Aviator) games which they offer from Spribe.

You can filter games by game providers or use the search bar to look for a specific game and you can play games for free (demo). The look of their lobby is ok, nothing specifically stands out, allowing you to focus on games. If you're looking for some flash, you won't find it here.

1good.bet Accessibility & UX

7/10

Number of Supported Languages

1good.bet offers its site in more languages than most casinos!

Cryptocurrencies

1good.bet accepts only 6 cryptocurrencies (most casinos accept at least 10)

Restricted Countries

1good.bet restricts less countires from playing than most casinos!

* Includes restricted countries for using bonuses as well.

Desktop Site Speed

1good.bet's desktop website is slower compared to majority of casinos

* Measured with Google Page Speed Insights (Largest Content Paint)

Mobile Site Speed

1good.bet's mobile website is among the fastest!

* Measured with Google Page Speed Insights (Largest Content Paint)

Hard to Find Info

1good.bet has all important information easily accessible

Lost or Diminished Functionalities on Mobile

1good.bet keeps all functionalities on mobile

Popup Notifications

1good.bet doesn't annoy you with intrusive and unnecessery notifications and popups

* Popups and notifications are deemed intrusive if they keep opening on multiple pages even after closing, covering the majority of the screen and generally interfering with user experience.

1good.bet casino is available in around 10 different languages and is restricted in a little more than 10 countries. See complete lists of all currencies, payment methods, countries and game providers in the 1Good.Bet review details.

They accept around 10 fiat currencies and nearly 10 cryptocurrencies. They could offer more cryptocurrencies to keep up with some of the best crypto casinos (like BC.Game), but 10 different cryptos is still more than some casinos offer.

All important things are easily accessible from anywhere on the website and the account dashboard is clean and easy to use. The visual aspect is a bit plain, but that also makes their website faster and easy to maintain, so if you're not looking for embellishments, they have what you need.

The only annoying thing is the registration window, which keeps popping up if you're not registered and logged in yet. It's not too user friendly if you're just browsing and trying out the games they have, but if you're planning to sign up, then it doesn't matter.

The website is accessible by VPN (tested with UrbanVpn).

1good.bet Login, Signup & Payments

6/10

Required Personal Info to Sign Up and Play

1good.bet requires a lot of personal information to sign up and play

Sign Up Process

1good.bet's sign up process is either longer or more complex compared to most casinos

Deposits

1good.bet has a very low min. deposit and unlimited max. deposit!

Withdrawals

1good.bet has a very low min. withdrawal compared to most casinos and has a very low max. withdrawal.

Cryptocurrencies

1good.bet accepts very few cryptocurrencies compared to most casinos (that accept at least 10).

Use of Bonus Codes

To use bonus codes you must either contact support or be careful where and when you enter them

Wagering deposits

You need to wager your deposit amount only once before being eligible for a withdrawal.

1Good.Bet casino's signup process requires quite a lot of personal information, whether you're planning on playing with fiat or crypto. So if you're expecting anonymity, you won't find it there. Instead, BitStarz or Thunderpick will be a better anonymous crypto casino option. When you signup and want to deposit (again, regardless of the chosen currency), the process won't let you continue unless you confirm your email and phone number.

They support around 10 fiat currencies, nearly 10 cryptocurrencies and around 10 other payment options. The minimum deposit is 10 € and the maximum withdrawal is 5,000 € per week, which is a bit lower than in most casinos, where you can usually withdraw 1 BTC or more. They offer payments using Visa and MasterCard, along with some other payment providers.

The process of depositing is a bit confusing, as they offer what appears as 3 different crypto deposit options, neither of them defining exactly which currencies it supports. It turns out that they aren't the same, because they are offered through third party crypto processing operators and aren't made directly through blockchain only. That might be the reason for the lack of anonymity. The depositing process has quite a few steps and opens up additional windows. This could be made simpler - this is one of the benefits of using crypto after all and it's a shame 1Good.Bet isn't taking advantage of it.

1good.bet Regular Players Treatment

8/10

Newsletter

You can sign up to 1good.bet's newsletter.

Regular Weekly Promotions

1good.bet has very few or no regular weekly promotions.

VIP/Loyalty Program

1good.bet has a good loyalty program!

Support

1good.bet's support is one of the best and will sure take care of all your needs!

* 1good.betSupport is rated in the support section of 1good.bet review.

1good.bet casino offers a newsletter and a loyalty program, but the information about the loyalty program can only be known after you contact their support team via email.

They don't offer any regular player bonuses besides the bonuses that you receive if you join their Loyalty program, however, they do offer a lot of welcome bonuses that are worth checking out.

They could offer at least some regular bonuses for all players not just for the players in the loyalty program. They have a variety of first deposit bonuses, however, they have a high wagering requirement so you won't receive any big value from them. Knowing this you might want to check out other casinos that offer more regular bonuses and promotions.

They provide 24/7 support via live chat or email. They have friendly support agents who respond within minutes. For more information, check the support section.

1good.bet VIP + Loyalty

1good.bet offers a so-called Loyalty Program, however, you can only join it by contacting support via email: support@goood.bet. I tried contacting them, but they haven't responded.

 

1good.bet Support

10/10

Number of Support Options

1good.bet could have more support options apart from live chat (the best casinos include live chat, email and telephone)

Live Chat Experience

1good.bet's live chat doesn't send an email when the chat is over or if the response is late.

Response Time

1good.bet's live chat response time is a few seconds or up to a few minutes tops!

Bots & Agents

Live chat agents give usefull and to the point answers and they are both professional and friendly.

* Talking to a bot is not necesserily a bad thing but it does prolong the time for resolving your issue if you must talk to an agent.

1good.bet casino can be contacted through their live chat or email. They also have a FAQ page which you can find in the footer at the bottom of the page.

The agents respond in minutes and are very professional. They usually provide the answers and solutions to the client's needs. The live chat window stays open if you switch pages, so you do not lose any of the chat. They also offer an image option so you can visually explain your "problem".

The best thing about live chat support is that they do not use bots and are at your service 24/7.

1good.bet Resposible Gambling

1good.bet casino does not offer many responsible gambling features, only the Self-exclusion one, which can be enabled by contacting support, and the deposit limits that can be set in your account under the "my limits" section.

If you enable Self-exclusion, you won't be able to deposit or withdraw any money from your account, knowing this we suggest you request a withdrawal before enabling the self-exclusion option.

The responsible gambling section can be found in the footer of the page and provides all the information about responsible gambling. If you want to enable it, you need to contact support.

Or you can check our page about responsible gambling where you can find all the information and contacts.

1good.bet Social Media & Groups

1good.bet casino does not have any social media accounts.
